title: bhuvanEshvari pughal
sahitya:
bhuvanEshvari pughal unadu pAdam purahara manOhAriNi pUraNi


anupallavi

  avani tanilE paNiyum adiyArk-kAnanda bhOga vAzhvaruLum ambA


caraNam   karuNAkarI shankarI sarvalOka kAraNi bhava nivAraNi jananI
sharaNAgati nin caraNAmbujam shakti svarUpiNi tAyE mAyE
